summary: This bill, the "Blocking Lawless Open Border Cities and States Act of 2025" (BLOC Act), aims to restrict certain federal funding for infrastructure projects to states and their political subdivisions that do not notify the Secretary of Homeland Security before releasing detained aliens. The notification requirement applies when the alien is unlawfully present, Homeland Security provides notice, and the alien has been detained for at least 48 hours. The bill amends Title 23 of the United States Code.
